rule: If the chatbot is unable to process or determine the part of speech for the provided word, the output must be "CantAnswer", written exactly as shown and must not include any additional characters, spaces, or punctuation.
input: sentence: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet., word: Lorem
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'NNP', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags in the description. There is no obvious violation of the description as it only asks for a tag.
OK
